definition: Songshan or Sungshan district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan/Matsuyama, city in Japan
pine/CL:棵[ke1]
surname Song
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
Songshan or Sungshan district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan/Songshan district of Chifeng city 赤峰市, Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: Is Taipei Songshan a suitable airport for cross-strait direct flight?
sentences.chinese: 臺北松山機場是否適合成爲兩岸的直航機場？

sentences.english: The Song Mountain was named as the "Oriental Gibraltar" by American military experts.
sentences.chinese: 松山被美國軍事家稱爲“東方直布羅陀”。

sentences.english: The Sungshan forest tourist area is the northern region only state-level nature protection area.
sentences.chinese: 松山森林旅遊區是華北地區唯一的國家級自然保護區。

sentences.english: Do you know how to get to Sungshan Station?
sentences.chinese: 您知道松山車站要怎麼去嗎？

sentences.english: There is difference on income of raising seedlings along with difference of tree species in Songshan national nursery garden.
sentences.chinese: 松山區國有苗圃育苗，由於樹種不同，收入也有差異。

sentences.english: I often go to Song Shan Lake.
Seiko Fujioka was born in Matsuyama, Ehime Prefecture, Japan in 1982.
sentences.chinese: 藤岡聖子，1982年生於日本愛媛縣松山市。

sentences.english: The Songshan Military Campaign between the Chinese Expeditionary Army and the Japanese Invaders in 1944 lasted three months and three days.
sentences.chinese: 遠征軍和日軍之間展開的松山戰役歷時三個月零三天。

sentences.english: Do you understand the way to Sungshan Airport?
sentences.chinese: 您知道到松山機場的路嗎？

sentences.english: Guia Hill also known as Pine Tree, tourism is also a good place.
sentences.chinese: 東望洋山又名松山，也是旅遊的好去處。
